sourcesContent:
import { BugProject } from "../../redux/selectors/bugSelectors" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Container, Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid, } from "@mui/material" export const BugDescription = () => { const {projectId, bugId} = useParams() const bugProject = BugProject() const searchSelectedBug = bugProject?.filter(bug => bug.id === parseInt(bugId)) return ( Ticket Description : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.description}
Title : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.title} Assigned_to : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.assigned_to_name} Created : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.date}
Priority : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.priority} Project : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.project} Status : {searchSelectedBug[0]?.status} ) }
